entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
